Description: 1 spacer bead and 10 beads of different shapes made of faience A: spacer-bead made of faience with remains of light blue glaze, two segments preserved B: 8 fragments of cylindrical segmented beads, some of them probably joined to one bead made of faience, no coloured glaze visible C: two spherical beads made of faience, no coloured glaze visible
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
